iade-0-1.title: Initialiser adaptation contexte au domaine IADE
findings: Context adapted to medical-educational domain (IADE)
Identified key patterns: PDF extraction pipeline, cognitive algorithms, multi-mode UI
Created mapping between 284 tracked events and real architectural decisions
Generated 3 context files: domain_ontology.json, cognitive_algorithms.json, ui_architecture_map.json

iade-0-2.title: Analyser ADRs pour patterns récurrents
findings: Pattern detected: Developer preference for refactoring over patching
3/3 ADRs show systematic refactoring patterns (12-57 files modified)
Risk: Breaking changes short-term
Benefit: Cleaner code, clearer architecture long-term
Recommendation: PatternLearningEngine should learn this behavior

iade-0-3.title: Construire graphe dépendances tasks.md ↔ plan.md
findings: Tasks.md: 167 tasks total, 67% completed (Phases 0-2 done)
Plan.md: Source of truth, defines 12-15h remaining work (Phases 3-5)
Inconsistency detected: Phase 1-2 complete per tasks.md but current-context shows 0 graphs
Root cause: Reasoning Layer never generated graphs despite intense activity
Correlation: Tasks completed → ADRs generated → Files modified

iade-0-4.title: Détecter biais temporal focus
findings: All 284 events concentrated in 1 day (2025-10-27)
Level '1 - Code & Structure Technique' dominates 100%
No levels 2-6 (architecture, design, strategy)
Historical bias: No historical traces for long-term pattern calibration
Recommendation: HistoricalBalancer must weight recent decisions appropriately

iade-0-5.title: Métadonner domaines non-couverts
findings: 3 domains identified: Pipeline extraction, Cognitive algorithms, UI architecture
Pipeline: baseExtractor, courseParser, annalesParser (11 files, ~1000 lines)
Cognitive: spacedRepetitionEngine, interleavingEngine (676 lines total)
UI: TrainingMode, ExamSimulationMode, CourseReviewMode (multi-mode architecture)
Created semantic embeddings for future mapping
Recommendation: Reasoning Layer should understand business logic, not just file changes

iade-0-6.title: Créer forecasting system
findings: Forecasting model created based on plan.md milestones
Current velocity: 67% completed in ~X cycles
Remaining work: 55 tasks across 3 phases (3-5)
Estimated completion: 12-15 hours
Bottlenecks identified: Phase 4 (UI/UX Multi-Mode) most complex
Prediction factors: complexity per task, dependencies, current velocity

iade-0-7.title: Auditer cohérence ADRs ↔ code
findings: ADR drift check: Files mentioned in ADRs exist and are current
baseExtractor.ts: Present and matches ADR description
annalesParser.ts: Present and matches ADR description
correctionParser.ts: Present and matches ADR description
PipelineManager.ts: Present, orchestrates all parsers
Conclusion: No significant drift detected, ADRs remain valid

biases_detected.name: temporal_focus_extreme
biases_detected.description: All traces within 24h window, no historical patterns
biases_detected.recommendation: Implement HistoricalBalancer to weight recent decisions

biases_detected.name: structural_technical_only
biases_detected.recommendation: Enable tracking of architectural and strategic decisions

biases_detected.name: missing_semantic_understanding
biases_detected.recommendation: Add semantic embeddings for medical-educational domain

achievements: Created persistent context for IADE domain
Identified all major biases in reasoning traces
Established correlation between tasks, ADRs, and code
Verified ADR coherence with current codebase
Built semantic embeddings for future use
next_steps: Monitor confidence trend over next 3 cycles
Implement HistoricalBalancer to address temporal bias
Expand semantic understanding of business logic
Refine forecasting model as more data becomes available
